00070 Spectrum
00071         InfiniteAreaLight::Le(const RayDifferential &r) const {
00072         Vector w = r.d;
00073         // Compute infinite light radiance for direction
00074         Spectrum L = Lbase;
00075         if (radianceMap != NULL) {
00076                 Vector wh = Normalize(WorldToLight(w));
00077                 float s = SphericalPhi(wh) * INV_TWOPI;
00078                 float t = SphericalTheta(wh) * INV_PI;
00079                 L *= radianceMap->Lookup(s, t);
00080         }
00081         return L;
00082 }
00083 Spectrum InfiniteAreaLight::Sample_L(const Point &p,
00084                 const Normal &n, float u1, float u2,
00085                 Vector *wi, float *pdf,
00086                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00087         // Sample cosine-weighted direction on unit sphere
00088         float x, y, z;
00089         ConcentricSampleDisk(u1, u2, &x, &y);
00090         z = sqrtf(max(0.f, 1.f - x*x - y*y));
00091         if (RandomFloat() < .5) z *= -1;
00092         *wi = Vector(x, y, z);
00093         // Compute _pdf_ for cosine-weighted infinite light direction
00094         *pdf = fabsf(wi->z) * INV_TWOPI;
00095         // Transform direction to world space
00096         Vector v1, v2;
00097         CoordinateSystem(Normalize(Vector(n)), &v1, &v2);
00098         *wi = Vector(v1.x * wi->x + v2.x * wi->y + n.x * wi->z,
00099                      v1.y * wi->x + v2.y * wi->y + n.y * wi->z,
00100                      v1.z * wi->x + v2.z * wi->y + n.z * wi->z);
00101         visibility->SetRay(p, *wi);
00102         return Le(RayDifferential(p, *wi));
00103 }
00104 float InfiniteAreaLight::Pdf(const Point &, const Normal &n,
00105                 const Vector &wi) const {
00106         return AbsDot(n, wi) * INV_TWOPI;
00107 }

00116 float InfiniteAreaLight::Pdf(const Point &, const Vector &) const {
00117         return 1.f / (4.f * M_PI);
00118 }
00119 Spectrum InfiniteAreaLight::Sample_L(const Scene *scene,
00120                 float u1, float u2, float u3, float u4,
00121                 Ray *ray, float *pdf) const {
00122         // Choose two points _p1_ and _p2_ on scene bounding sphere
00123         Point worldCenter;
00124         float worldRadius;
00125         scene->WorldBound().BoundingSphere(&worldCenter,
00126                                             &worldRadius);
00127         worldRadius *= 1.01f;
00128         Point p1 = worldCenter + worldRadius *
00129                 UniformSampleSphere(u1, u2);
00130         Point p2 = worldCenter + worldRadius *
00131                 UniformSampleSphere(u3, u4);
00132         // Construct ray between _p1_ and _p2_
00133         ray->o = p1;
00134         ray->d = Normalize(p2-p1);
00135         // Compute _InfiniteAreaLight_ ray weight
00136         Vector to_center = Normalize(worldCenter - p1);
00137         float costheta = AbsDot(to_center,ray->d);
00138         *pdf =
00139                 costheta / ((4.f * M_PI * worldRadius * worldRadius));
00140         return Le(RayDifferential(ray->o, -ray->d));
00141 }
00142 Spectrum InfiniteAreaLight::Sample_L(const Point &p,
00143                 Vector *wi, VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00144         float pdf;
00145         Spectrum L = Sample_L(p, RandomFloat(), RandomFloat(),
00146                 wi, &pdf, visibility);
00147         if (pdf == 0.f) return Spectrum(0.f);
00148         return L / pdf;
00149 }
